title: "Balcony" means a horizontal projection, including a parapet, hand- rail balustrade, to serve as a passage or sitting out place
clause_text: "Balcony" means a horizontal projection, including a parapet, hand- rail balustrade, to serve as a passage or sitting out place. "Basement or cellar" means the lower storey of a building below, or partly below the ground level.

source_pdf.text_snippet: "Balcony" means a horizontal projection, including a parapet, hand- rail balustrade, to serve as a passage or sitting out place.
